actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Workforce.

official_title: To require public elementary and middle schools that receive funds under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to obtain parental consent before changing a minor's gender markers, pronouns, or preferred name on any school form or sex-based accommodations, including locker rooms or bathrooms.
short_title: Parental Rights Over The Education and Care of Their Kids Act

titles.title: Parental Rights Over The Education and Care of Their Kids Act

To require public elementary and middle schools that receive funds under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to obtain parental consent before changing a minor's gender markers, pronouns, or preferred name on any school form or sex-based accommodations, including locker rooms or bathrooms.
